metadata.title: CVE-2020-11863 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
libEMF (aka ECMA-234 Metafile Library) through 1.0.11 allows denial ofservice (issue 1 of 2).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11863` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libemf1 - 1.0.12-1
printemf - 1.0.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libemf package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.12-1').
